Specimen Type: Muscle biopsies, nerve biopsies, blood samples, skin biopsies
Purpose: To generate accurate analytical results for the diagnosis and management of neuromuscular disorders.
Container: Sterile containers for biopsies; temperature-controlled blood collection tubes (e.g., EDTA or serum separator tubes)
Equipment: Cryostat, microtome, light microscope, electron microscope, spectrophotometer, gel electrophoresis apparatus
